About Me

Allow me to introduce you to a little bit of myself through my hobbies...

Mini Description Of My Hobbies

I like to read at least two pages of a book each day. I'm currently reading about Sherlock Holmes adventures. Some of my favorite books are The Inheritance Cycle by Christopher Paolini, Kokoro by Natsume S≈çseki, The Noticer Returns by Andy Andrews, and Mini Habits by Stephen Guise.

I love watching Japanese anime, with English subtitles of course! I remember watching Dragon Ball, Naruto, and Bleach when I was a child on TV and being fully immersed in what I was watching. That hasn't changed now either! Some of my favorite anime are Naruto, Death Note, Attack on Titan, Fullmetal Alchemist Brotherhood, and Ace of Diamond.

I used to be an avid gamer when I was playing Call of Duty Modern Warfare 3. I got into making YouTube videos using clips I recorded. However, now I rarely play but my best friend recently let me borrow Kingdom Hearts, so I will slowly make my way through that adventure with Sora and his friends!
